#crypto scaling cheat sheet:

L0/1: block propagation (bloXroute), sharding, big blocks, novel algos, S(T/N)ARKS

Trusted extra-network: "crypto banks" and other trusted rails

949289212507025408.text:
Meltdown + Spectre & Your Cryptocurrencies:
- More risk w funds on exchgs, esp w few cold keys
- More risk loading keys/transacting regularly on all hardware
- More risk across VPSs, shared hosting
- More risk on unupgraded systems, esp. Intel systems
- More multisig xparty risk

948963012479614976.text:
Please stay secure out there. The spectre vulns are NOT going to be fun, especially if you have keys on your computer.
- Update your OS immediately (seriously!)
- Update your browsers
- Use Chrome with site isolation enabled: chrome://flags/#enable-site-per-process
